title: Brochure, "Brochure for New Books from the Noonday Press, Fall 1953", 1953
medium: Lithography in black and orange ink on off-white wove paper
inscribed: Printed vertically in black ink, right margin: NOONDAY. Printed horizontally in black ink, left margin: new/books/from/the/Noonday/Press/fall/1953.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Design for verticle rectangular pamphlet cover with orange ground. On middle right side of pamphlet is blue circular starburst shape, likely a sticker meant to hold pamphlet shut. On the inside is a listing of Noonday Press staff, including credit to Alvin Lustig as designer, as well as address information. The 6 pages contain synopsis nad review information for books. On the inside back cover is a listing for books for Spring 1954.

tombstone.epitaph:
Brochure, "Brochure for New Books from the Noonday Press, Fall 1953", 1953.
1953. Lithography in black and orange ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-171.
